title: Wanted: T213-1 HOFer Portrait, Chance, Huggins, Marquard
author: B O'Brien

posts.post_title: Wanted: T213-1 HOFer Portrait, Chance, Huggins, Marquard
posts.post_content:
Hey all,
I missed the Chance Port in Memory Lane earlier this year. Thought I had it, but woke up and realized that I did not…..

I’d love to add a Type 1 HOFer portrait. I have a Bender type 1 and a bunch of T206 and other odds and ends I could use as trade.

Open to buying as well. Let me know if any chance!

Thanks,
Bob
